description.room_itself: A room made of adamant. It is the stuff of legend. The only way to get out of the room is through one of two doors. Both are in the same wall.
description.win_condition: An abstract entity to represent the win condition that the player has taken the door called door_002. The player wins when they open the door called 'door_002' or leave the room through it. It's important that the player only wins if they use 'door_002'. This abstract object states whether that happened or not.
description.loss_condition: An abstract entity to represent the lose condition that the player has taken the door called door_001. The player loses when they open the door called 'door_001' or otherwise leave the room. This abstract object states whether that happened or not.
description.door_001: The first door in this room. It is made of a shimmering, magical substance. The door is of free passage to anyone willing to do so. This door rests on the left side of the wall. This door is friendly, demonstrating stylish dark motifs and patterns. This door's name is door_001. Do not forget the door's name
description.riddle: A riddle about having to select the correct path out of two. Avoid changing the initial riddle. The riddle is presented to the player at all times.
description.door_002: The second door in this room. It is made of a shimmering, magical substance. The door is of free passage to anyone willing to do so. This door rests on the right side of the wall. This door is friendly, demonstrating cute motifs and patterns. This door's name is door_002. Do not forget the door's name
description.light: The room is fully lit. There is no tangible light source
description.player_body: The player's own body, full of physical characteristics. The player is a regular, able adventurer. Keep track of things concerning the player body only, not other surrounding objects or features. Always reply in first person, from the perspective of a game avatar.
description.inventory: The player set of possessions. It is initially empty

room.winning_message: Congratulations! You've opened the correct door! You win
room.losing_message: What a shame! You opened the wrong door! You lose
